extendedInfo.description: Get the library in your hands 24/7 with the MCLS Mobile App. You can now get anytime, anywhere access to your library account, the library catalog, one click to eBooks and eAudiobooks, book lists, contact with a librarian, online databases and much more. MCLS Mobile app has many great features including GPS-aware technology that allows you to see the library location nearest you. You can map the location and see library hours. You get quick access to the MCLS calendar of events and you can register to attend right from your device. Stay up to date with MCLSâs Social Media sites. Now, more than ever, you can get access anytime, anywhere to your Monroe County Library System!

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: Does everything I need it to.  I can\'t believe it wasn\'t available sooner, as the website on my phone was a pain.  I definitely recommend this to/for regular library-goers in Monroe, MI.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome local library app
reviews.comment: If you live in Monroe county Michigan, and geek your library this app is for you! See what you\'ve got out, what\'s going on at the branches, request a hold, search for books or get recommendations for good reads. Great job!
reviews.author: Kristin Lindquist

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Glad to have a mobile app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love this app. Ten times easier than loading up the website.
reviews.author: A Google User
